basics.name: Ying Xiong
basics.label: Atmopsheric Chemist
basics.summary: An early-career scientist with a climate commitment to combat global warming, preseving ecosystems, and safegard the well-being of current and future generations

work.name: Department of Climate and Space Sciences and Engineering, University of Michigan
work.summary: Data analysis and modeling of space-based and airborne measurements of greenhouse gases and air pollutants to better understand emissions magnitudes and processes. I am also participate in preparation of technical papers and reports related to my research, collaboration with other group members engaged in related research and in mentoring and supervising undergraduate and graduate students engaged in research activities.

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
